landing.title: Where Ideas Flow and Work Gets Done
landing.subtitle: The Anti-Todo List for Deep Thinkers.

eisenhower.title: Eisenhower Matrix
eisenhower.text: Stop guessing what to do next. Drag your tasks into four quadrants to prioritize urgency and importance.

heatmap.title: Productivity Heatmap
heatmap.text: Visualize your progress over the last year. A persistent record of your focus sessions and completed missions.

qr_sync.title: Instant QR Pairing
qr_sync.text: Connect your tablet or phone instantly. Scan a code and your canvas and tasks sync across all screens in real-time.

lasso.title: Lasso Selection
lasso.text: Your ink is now alive. Select, move, and reorganize your drawings with the new Lasso tool.

magic_wand.title: Magic Wand (OCR)
magic_wand.text: Convert handwriting to digital tasks using AI. Write it out, and watch it become data instantly.

step1.title: 1. Capture (Blackbox)
step1.text: Dump your brain onto the infinite canvas. Sketches, code snippets, or raw notes.

step2.title: 2. Prioritize
step2.text: Use the Eisenhower view to decide what actually matters right now.

step3.title: 3. Focus (Sniper Mode)
step3.text: Lock into one task. The Pomodoro timer keeps you disciplined.

step4.title: 4. Analyze (Reality Check)
step4.text: End your day by reviewing your achievements and watching your heatmap grow.

benefits_over_paper.title: Why InkFlow is Better Than Paper

infinite_space.title: Infinite Space
infinite_space.text: Never run out of room for your ideas. Your canvas is limitless.

collaboration.title: Real-Time Collaboration
collaboration.text: Collaborate in real-time. A peer-to-peer connection that works across most networks, no central server required.

non_destructive.title: Non-Destructive & Editable
non_destructive.text: Erase, move, and scale your ideas without a trace. Perfection is just an edit away.

integrated_tools.title: All-in-One Toolkit
integrated_tools.text: Your notes, tasks, and focus timers are all in one, seamless workspace.

eco_friendly.title: Eco-Friendly
eco_friendly.text: Save trees and reduce waste. Your digital workspace is your contribution to a greener planet.

pain_section.title: The Pain: Analysis Paralysis
pain_section.text: You're a creator. A developer. Your mind generates ideas faster than you can write them down. But traditional tools force you into a vicious cycle: endless lists, daunting backlogs, and the procrastination that comes with overwhelm. Every new idea becomes a debt.

solution_section.title: The Solution: Flow Engineering
solution_section.text: InkFlow breaks this cycle with a high-performance system designed for deep work. It combines the tactile freedom of paper with the logic of digital synchronization.

engineering_section.title: Engineering Showcase
engineering_section.intro: InkFlow was built with performance and privacy as pillars.
engineering_section.question: "Why C++ for drawing on the web?"
engineering_section.answer: To achieve zero latency. The drawing engine is written in C++ and compiled to WebAssembly, ensuring that your digital pen is an extension of your thought, not a hindrance.
